text:
="preserve">Josep Fornas Martínez (19 October 1924 – 4 January 2021) was a Spanish politician, businessman and editor. He was born in Barcelona. Fornas was a member of the Democratic Union of Catalonia and Republican Left of Catalonia. He was a member of the Parliament of Catalonia from 1980 to 1984.
Fornas died on 4 January 2021 in Barcelona, aged 96.
